title: Create agent/harness/claude/ package
description: Merge ClaudeCodeType + ClaudeCodeAdapter into ClaudeCodeHarness. Constructor takes HarnessConfig + activitylog.Logger. Name() returns 'claude_code'. HandleOutput() is no-op. BuildCommandEnvVars(h2Dir) uses config dir from HarnessConfig. Move hook_handler.go, otel_parser.go, sessionlog.go from adapter/claude/. Merge tests from adapter/claude/adapter_test.go + agent_type_test.go Claude tests.
